mapper.sql: select dealer.aid from tsales_apply_contract contract left join tsales_apply_store store on store.asqbh=contract.asqbh left join tBase_Dealer dealer on dealer.aid=store.atbddm left join Tinfo_Loanfile loanfile on loanfile.asqbh=contract.asqbh left join TINFO_LOANFILE_APPEAL appeal on store.asqbh=appeal.asqbh where trunc(sysdate) >= trunc(appeal.dqhrq) and contract.ahtzt='2' and nvl(loanfile.awjzt,'4') !='3'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBASE_DEALER td SET td.ASFXBZHFK = '1' , td.AESCSFXBZ = '1' WHERE td.AID IN ( SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp )
mapper.insert: insert into policy_change_log(id, channel_code,event_type, event_value, op_tms, op_reason, op_id, op_name) ( select sys_guid(),dealer.aid,'0001001','1',sysdate,'系统自动切换','system','system' from tBase_Dealer dealer INNER JOIN dealer_switch_temp temp ON temp.ajxsdm = dealer.AID where dealer.isnewtbasedealer = '1' UNION select sys_guid(),dealer.aid,'0001002','1',sysdate,'系统自动切换','system','system' from tBase_Dealer dealer INNER JOIN dealer_switch_temp temp ON temp.ajxsdm = dealer.AID where dealer.isnewtbasedealer = '1' )

insert into Tsys_Info_Remind(Id,Atxrylx,Atxnr,Atxsm,Aljdz,Atxlx,Atxry,Abz1,Abz2,Tsj,Aqybz) (select sys_guid(),'4','客户贷后资料未完成上传已超期，店面系统已被切换','客户贷后资料超期未完成上传清单','/topcars/operate/archives/ftl/LoanfileSwitch.ftl?atbddm='||dealer.aid, '01',dealer.aid,'233','admin',sysdate,'1' from tBase_Dealer dealer inner join dealer_switch_temp temp on temp.ajxsdm = dealer.aid where not exists(select remind.abz2 from Tsys_Info_Remind remind where remind.atxlx='01' and remind.atxry=dealer.aid and remind.aqybz='1') )
mapper.update: update tBase_Dealer dealer set asfxbzhfk='0' where aid in ( select switch.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not IN (SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp) and switch.aqhtj!=1 )
mapper.insert: insert into policy_change_log(id, channel_code,event_type, event_value, op_tms, op_reason, op_id, op_name) ( select sys_guid(),dealer.aid,'0001001','0',sysdate,'系统自动切换','system','system' from tBase_Dealer dealer where dealer.aid in ( select switch.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not IN ( SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp ) and switch.aqhtj!=1 ) and dealer.isnewtbasedealer = '1' )

insert into TLog_Dealer_Switch(Id,Abz,Aczr,Dczsj,Ajxsdm,Aqhlx) ( select sys_guid(),'系统恢复切换（影像件）','admin',sysdate,switch.ajxsdm,'0' from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp) and switch.aqhtj!=1 )
mapper.update: update Tsys_Info_Remind set aqybz='0' where atxlx='01' and aqybz='1' and atxry not in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp)
mapper.insert: insert into Dealer_Switch(Id,Abz,Aczr,Dczsj,Ajxsdm,Aqhlx,aqhtj) (select sys_guid(),'系统自动切换（影像件）','admin',sysdate,dealer.aid,'1',0 from tBase_Dealer dealer where (not exists(select t.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch t where dealer.aid=t.Ajxsdm and aqhtj!=1 ) and dealer.aid in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp)))
mapper.sql: select dealer.aid from tsales_apply_contract contract left join tsales_apply_store store on store.asqbh=contract.asqbh left join Tinfo_Loanfile loanfile on loanfile.asqbh=contract.asqbh left join TINFO_LOANFILE_APPEAL appeal on store.asqbh=appeal.asqbh left join tBase_Dealer dealer on dealer.aid=store.atbddm LEFT JOIN tsales_apply_car car ON car.ASQBH = contract.ASQBH where trunc(loanfile.DWJZSHGRQ+30) <= trunc(sysdate) and loanfile.asfjd='0' and contract.ahtzt='2' and car.ACLLX in ('1','3') and nvl(loanfile.awjzt,'4')='3'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBASE_DEALER td SET td.asfxbzhfkgd = '1' WHERE td.AID IN ( SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp )
mapper.insert: insert into policy_change_log(id, channel_code,event_type, event_value, op_tms, op_reason, op_id, op_name) ( select sys_guid(),dealer.aid,'0001003','1',sysdate,'系统自动切换','system','system' from tBase_Dealer dealer INNER JOIN dealer_switch_temp temp ON temp.ajxsdm = dealer.AID where dealer.isnewtbasedealer = '1' )

insert into TLog_Dealer_Switch(Id,Abz,Aczr,Dczsj,Ajxsdm,Aqhlx) ( select sys_guid(),'系统自动切换新车（归档）','admin',sysdate,dealer.aid,'1' from tBase_Dealer dealer inner join dealer_switch_temp temp on temp.ajxsdm = dealer.aid )

insert into Tsys_Info_Remind(Id,Atxrylx,Atxnr,Atxsm,Aljdz,Atxlx,Atxry,Abz1,Abz2,Tsj,Aqybz) (select sys_guid(),'4','客户贷后资料实物未完成归档已超期，店面系统已被切换','客户贷后资料超期未完成实物归档','/topcars/operate/archives/ftl/LoanfileSwitch.ftl?atbddm='||dealer.aid, '04',dealer.aid,'233','admin',sysdate,'1' from tBase_Dealer dealer inner join dealer_switch_temp temp on temp.ajxsdm = dealer.aid where not exists(select remind.abz2 from Tsys_Info_Remind remind where remind.atxlx='04' and remind.atxry=dealer.aid and remind.aqybz='1') )
mapper.update: update tBase_Dealer dealer set asfxbzhfkgd='0' where aid in ( select switch.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not IN (SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp) and switch.aqhtj = 1 and switch.asfxcqh=1 )
mapper.insert: insert into policy_change_log(id, channel_code,event_type, event_value, op_tms, op_reason, op_id, op_name) ( select sys_guid(),dealer.aid,'0001003','0',sysdate,'系统自动切换','system','system' from tBase_Dealer dealer where dealer.aid in ( select switch.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not IN ( SELECT ajxsdm FROM dealer_switch_temp ) and switch.aqhtj = 1 and switch.asfxcqh=1 ) and dealer.isnewtbasedealer = '1' )

insert into TLog_Dealer_Switch(Id,Abz,Aczr,Dczsj,Ajxsdm,Aqhlx) ( select sys_guid(),'系统恢复切换新车（归档）','admin',sysdate,switch.ajxsdm,'0' from Dealer_Switch switch where switch.Aczr='admin' and switch.Ajxsdm not in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp) and switch.aqhtj=1 and switch.asfxcqh=1 )
mapper.update: update Tsys_Info_Remind set aqybz='0' where atxlx='04' and aqybz='1' and atxry not in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp)
mapper.insert: insert into Dealer_Switch(Id,Abz,Aczr,Dczsj,Ajxsdm,Aqhlx,aqhtj,asfxcqh) (select sys_guid(),'系统自动切换（影像件）','admin',sysdate,dealer.aid,'1',1 ,1 from tBase_Dealer dealer where (not exists(select t.Ajxsdm from Dealer_Switch t where dealer.aid=t.Ajxsdm and t.aqhtj=1 and t.asfxcqh=1 ) and dealer.aid in(select ajxsdm from dealer_switch_temp)))
